name: Swiftblade
description: A swift and elegant sword that grants increased attack speed.
looks: The Swiftblade is a sleek and lightweight sword with a curved blade. It has a black leather-wrapped hilt and a silver guard adorned with intricate patterns. The blade itself is made of polished steel and is incredibly sharp.

special_weapon_skills.dual_wield: Allows the wielder to dual wield the Swiftblade with another one-handed weapon.

special_effects.quick_strikes: Grants a chance to perform additional fast attacks.

name: Flaming Sword
description: A sword imbued with the power of fire. It is capable of dealing both physical and fire damage.
looks: The Flaming Sword has a long, straight blade made of steel. The hilt is decorated with intricate engravings and has a pommel in the shape of a flame.

special_weapon_skills.fire_magic: Grants a bonus to Fire Magic skill when wielded.

name: Iron Helmet
description: A sturdy iron helmet that provides good protection for the head.
looks: The iron helmet is made of solid iron with a smooth surface. It has a rounded shape with a face guard that covers the lower part of the face. There are small openings for the eyes and a ventilation hole at the top.

name: Legendary Sword of the Sun
description: A magnificent sword that radiates pure sunlight, said to have been forged by the gods themselves.
looks: The Legendary Sword of the Sun has a blade made of shimmering golden steel, with intricate engravings representing the sun. The hilt is wrapped in white leather, and the pommel is shaped like a blazing sun. The sword emits a warm and comforting glow when wielded.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill.

special_effects.sunlight_strike: Has a chance to blind enemies with a blinding burst of sunlight upon striking.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: A pair of sturdy gauntlets made from steel.
looks: The gauntlets are made of polished steel, with reinforced plates to protect the hands and fingers. They have adjustable straps for a secure fit.

name: Steel Gauntlets
looks: The gauntlets are made of polished steel and have a plated design. They cover the hands and lower arms, providing excellent protection.

name: Bone Dagger
description: A small dagger made from bone, with a sharp and serrated blade.
looks: The bone dagger has a short blade made from a thick, curved piece of bone. The handle is wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skills.dagger_proficiency: Grants a bonus to Dagger proficiency when equipped.

name: Staff of Power
description: A legendary staff imbued with immense magical energy, capable of unleashing devastating spells.
looks: The Staff of Power is a tall and slender staff made of polished ebony wood. It is adorned with intricate golden runes that seem to glow with a soft radiance. At the top of the staff is a large, faceted crystal that shimmers with a dazzling array of colors.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of all spells cast while equipped.

special_weapon_skills.arcane_blast: Unleashes a powerful blast of arcane energy, dealing heavy damage to a single target.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: Heavy armor made from steel plates, providing excellent protection in battle.
looks: The Steel Plate Armor consists of interlocking steel plates, covering the entire body. It has extra reinforcements on the chest, shoulders, and knees. The armor is polished to a shine and has intricate engravings along the edges.

name: Silver Sword
description: A finely crafted sword made from pure silver.
looks: The Silver Sword has a gleaming silver blade that is sharp and polished. The hilt is wrapped in black leather and adorned with silver accents.

special_weapon_skils.sword_play: Allows the wielder to execute powerful swordplay techniques.

special_effects.silver_bane: Deals extra damage to creatures vulnerable to silver.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of wood and wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a simple design, with a straight blade and a hilt wrapped in leather.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy iron sword with a sharp blade.
looks: The iron sword has a long, silver blade with a slight curve. The hilt is made of black leather and has a crossguard that provides protection for the hand.

special_weapon_skills.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when used.

name: Samurai Sword
description: A razor-sharp katana that is the weapon of choice for samurai warriors.
looks: The samurai sword has a long, curved blade with a single edge. The blade is made of high-quality steel and has a polished finish. The hilt is wrapped in silk and the guard is decorated with intricate designs.

special_weapon_skils.swordsmanship: Grants a bonus to Swordsmanship skill when wielded.

name: Assassin's Dagger
description: A deadly dagger used by assassins for quick and silent kills.
looks: The Assassin's Dagger has a sleek and narrow blade with a sharp point. It is made from darkened steel and has a black handle wrapped in leather for a secure grip.

special_weapon_skils.assassination: Increases critical strike chance and damage when using this weapon.

special_effects.silent_strike: Allows the wielder to perform silent kills, avoiding detection.
